revised_title: Proceedings and List of Papers Read at the Royal Society Meeting, November 25, 1897
tldr: This article presents a list of papers and discussions held at the Royal Society meeting on November 25, 1897, covering topics such as statistics, evolution, biology, tuberculosis, and geology. Papers discussed include works by W. F. Sheppard, Karl Pearson, Arthur Ransom, Walter Heare, Swale Vincent, T. G. Bonney, Jagadis Chunder Bose, and others.
